resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107438</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107438</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206977</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Drug Descriptions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Droge-Beschreibungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Descriptions de Drogue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrições Da Droga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizioni Della Droga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφές φαρμάκων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripciones De la Droga</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the Controlled Substances Act and provides information on narcotics, depressants, stimulants, hallucinogens, cannabis, steroids, clandestine laboratories, inhalants, drug abuse and AIDS, state drug abuse prevention and treatment programs, and penalties for controlled-substance related infractions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft die kontrollierten Substanzen 
fungieren und zur Verfügung stellen Informationen auf 
Betäubungsmitteln, Beruhigungsmittel, Reizmittel, Halluzinogen, 
Hanf, Steroide, heimliche Labors, inhalants, Droge 
Mißbrauch und AIDS, Zustanddrogemißbrauch Verhinderung- und 
Behandlungprogramme und Strafen für Kontrolliertsubstanz in 
Verbindung gestandene Verletzungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine les substances commandées agissent et 
fournissent des informations sur des narcotiques, des dépresseurs, 
des stimulants, des hallucinogènes, cannabis, des stéroïdes, des 
laboratoires clandestins, des inhalants, abus et SIDA de drogue, des 
programmes d'empêchement et de traitement d'abus de drogue d'état, 
et des pénalités pour des infractions associées parsubstance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina as substâncias controladas agem e fornece
a informação em narcotics, depressants, stimulants, hallucinogens, 
cannabis, steroids, laboratórios clandestine, inhalants, abuso e AIDS
da droga, programas da prevenção e do tratamento do abuso da droga 
do estado, e penalidades para infractions relacionados 
controlado-substância.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina le sostanze controllate si comportano e 
forniscono le informazioni sui narcotici, i deprimenti, gli 
stimolanti, i hallucinogens, la canapa, gli steroidi, i laboratori 
clandestini, i inhalants, abuso della droga ed i AIDS, 
dichiarano i programmi di prevenzione e di trattamento di abuso 
della droga e le pene per le infrazioni riferite controllato-sostanza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τον ελεγχόμενο νόμο ουσιών και παρέχει τις 
πληροφορίες για τα ναρκωτικά, τα κατευναστικά, τα τονωτικά, τα 
παραισθησιογόνα, τις καννάβεις, τα στεροειδή, τα μυστικά 
εργαστήρια, inhalants, την κατάχρηση ναρκωτικών ουσιών και το 
AIDS, προγράμματα πρόληψης και θεραπείας κρατικής κατάχρησης 
ναρκωτικών ουσιών, και τις ποινικές ρήτρες για σχετικές με τις 
την ελέγχω-ουσία παραβιάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina las sustancias controladas actúan y 
proporcionan a la información en el narcótico, los deprimentes, los 
estimulantes, los hallucinogens, los cáñamos, los esteroides, los 
laboratorios clandestinos, los inhalants, abuso y SIDA de la droga, 
los programas de la prevención y del tratamiento del abuso de la 
droga del estado, y las penas para las infracciones relacionadas 
controlado-sustancia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206977</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107438</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/drug-descriptions</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
